prompts.prompt: Create a counter component that has a button that increases a counter every time its pressed. Style it well with Tailwind CSS using effects like hover. Add this component to the index page. Add a backend API endpoint that is called every time the counter is updated. Connect the Counter component with this API. Also initialize the counter value with an API that returns the current value of the counter in the backend.  Add a Decrease button. Add separate API routes and handlers for Increase and Decrease which are called upon pressing the corresponding buttons.
